job_tasks.phrase: Before diving into your IDE or notebook to start hacking, you will fully immerse yourself in the context of the business in order to come up with the best solution to the challenge.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context to formulate solutions, aligning with the definition of 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on prediction models, which are used in KLM live customer interactions 24/7. These models help our customers getting the right product and service for them.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of developing and working with predictive models, which falls under 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements;
job_tasks.justification: This task involves interacting with stakeholders to understand business needs, which is a key aspect of 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: Perform exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain important insights;
job_tasks.justification: Exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain insights is a fundamental part of data preparation and management for ML models, fitting 'Data Engineering & Management'.

job_tasks.phrase: Research and choose an appropriate set of potential models and loss functions that align with the problem and discuss validation strategies with your fellow data scientists;
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the process of selecting and validating models, which is central to 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: Perform feature engineering, be creative and combine new sources with the traditional data warehouses or our vast data lakes to increase model performance;
job_tasks.justification: Feature engineering and combining data sources to improve model performance are core tasks in data preparation and management, aligning with 'Data Engineering & Management'.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute experiments while logging your model's metrics, parameters and metadata to a model registry for easy sharing and reproducibility;
job_tasks.justification: Executing experiments and logging model details for reproducibility is part of the model development lifecycle, fitting 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: Put your model into production, and work together with engineers inside and outside of the team to ensure company-wide production standards are met;
job_tasks.justification: Putting models into production and ensuring production standards are met involves software development and integration practices, fitting 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain and/or improve your model through monitoring, re-training, adding new features etc.;
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, re-training, and improving models in production are key MLOps activities, aligning with 'Operations & MLOps (LLMOps)'.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide our upcoming transition to the cloud: Identify requirements and improvements, communicate them to relevant parties;
job_tasks.justification: Guiding cloud transition, identifying requirements, and communicating them involves software development and integration aspects, fitting 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Determine how Data Science requirements translate to architectural components and way of working;
job_tasks.justification: Translating data science requirements into architectural components is a software development and integration task, fitting 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Share your greatest lessons at one of the community events
job_tasks.justification: Sharing lessons at events is a form of knowledge sharing and communication, fitting 'Communication & Collaboration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Do you have what it takes to take KLM's data-driven decision-making to a higher level?
job_tasks.justification: This question relates to improving business decision-making through data, aligning with 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: How can we best manage the risk of having cash in foreign currencies?
job_tasks.justification: This is an example of a business problem that ML models are used to solve, relating to 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: How can we help the contracting team to extract rates from contracts?
job_tasks.justification: This is an example of a business problem that ML models are used to solve, relating to 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: How can we find invoices with incorrectly registered VAT?
job_tasks.justification: This is an example of a business problem that ML models are used to solve, relating to 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning'.

job_tasks.phrase: Can we use GenAI models to prevent revenue leakage during our invoicing process?
job_tasks.justification: This specifically mentions using GenAI models for a business problem, fitting 'Prompt Engineering & RAG' as it implies working with GenAI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Put ML use cases into production, adopting a practical and pragmatic mindset.
job_tasks.justification: Putting ML use cases into production while being pragmatic relates to business application and strategy, fitting 'Business Understanding & Strategy'.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a reliable partner for the business: ensuring robust, tested code, quality control, as well as maintaining existing solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring robust, tested code and maintaining solutions are core software engineering practices, fitting 'Software Development & Integration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Coach junior/medior data scientists & ML Engineers: set the right example and help them grow into the best version of themselves.
job_tasks.justification: Coaching and helping others grow is a key aspect of communication and collaboration, fitting 'Communication & Collaboration'.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical leadership.
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical leadership is a task that often involves guiding software development and integration efforts, fitting 'Software Development & Integration'.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional ML tasks such as 'prediction models', 'feature engineering', 'exploratory data analysis', and 'model development & fine-tuning'. While it mentions 'GenAI models' in one specific question, the core responsibilities and examples provided are centered around traditional ML. The role also includes significant software engineering aspects like putting models into production, MLOps, and translating requirements to architecture. Given the balance of traditional ML tasks (Macro-Category B) and software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A), and the focus on traditional ML over GenAI, the 'Core ML Engineer' profile is the most appropriate.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very detailed and provides clear examples of tasks. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is also made clear through the examples of business problems. The responsibilities align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
